title: "Exploratory Data Analysis"
output: html_notebook

Load tokinezed sampled corpora
```{r}
source('file2tokens.r')

smp.twitter <- file2tokens('./data/en_US/sample.twitter.txt')
smp.blogs <- file2tokens('./data/en_US/sample.blogs.txt')
smp.news <- file2tokens('./data/en_US/sample.news.txt')
```

Create count table
```{r}
source('EDA.R')
word.counts <- wordFreq(c(smp.twitter, smp.blogs, smp.news))
```

Plot most frequent words
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data=word.counts[1:50,], aes(x=reorder(word, -freq), y=freq)) + geom_bar(stat = 'identity') + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + xlab('word')
```
